options.content:
# Welcome to our ASSUME demo

This is the Grafana Dashboard which makes interacting with the simulation data very easy.

# Market-specific Data

Data specific for the market depending on the choice made at te top of the panel

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  product_start AS "time",
  supply_volume
FROM market_meta
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(product_start)
ORDER BY 1

panels.description: Overview of market results for the chossen market

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  product_start AS "time",
  demand_volume AS "Demand Volume",
  supply_volume AS "Supply Volume"
FROM market_meta
WHERE ("simulation" = '$simulation_comp') AND $__timeFilter(product_start)
GROUP BY simulation, product_start, demand_volume, supply_volume
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  product_start AS "time",
  price AS "Price"
FROM market_meta
WHERE ("simulation" LIKE '$simulation_comp') AND $__timeFilter(product_start)
GROUP BY market_id, simulation, product_start, price
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Market Summary EOM - $simulation_comp

panels.description: Overview of market results for the chossen market

targets.rawSql:
select sim1."time", sim2."Demand Volume" - sim1."Demand Volume" as "Demand Volume", sim2."Supply Volume" - sim1."Supply Volume" as "Supply Volume" from (
SELECT
  product_start AS "time",
  demand_volume AS "Demand Volume",
  supply_volume AS "Supply Volume"
FROM market_meta
WHERE ("simulation" LIKE '$simulation_base') AND $__timeFilter(product_start)
GROUP BY simulation, product_start, demand_volume, supply_volume
ORDER BY 1
) sim1
join (
SELECT
  product_start AS "time",
  demand_volume AS "Demand Volume",
  supply_volume AS "Supply Volume"
FROM market_meta
WHERE ("simulation" LIKE '$simulation_comp') AND $__timeFilter(product_start)
GROUP BY simulation, product_start, demand_volume, supply_volume
ORDER BY 1
) sim2 on sim1."Demand Volume" = sim2."Demand Volume"

select sim1."time", sim2."Price" - sim1."Price" as "Price" from (
SELECT
  product_start AS "time",
  price AS "Price"
FROM market_meta
WHERE ("simulation" LIKE '$simulation_base') AND $__timeFilter(product_start)
GROUP BY simulation, product_start, price
ORDER BY 1) sim1
join (
SELECT
  product_start AS "time",
  price AS "Price"
FROM market_meta
WHERE ("simulation" LIKE '$simulation_comp') AND $__timeFilter(product_start)
GROUP BY simulation, product_start, price
ORDER BY 1) sim2 on sim1.time = sim2.time

panels.title: Market Summary EOM - differences

panels.description: Bid prices of accepted bids per unit in the chosen market

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  price AS " ",
  unit_id AS "unit_id"
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_comp'
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, start_time, price
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(product_start,$__interval),
  price as "MCP"
FROM market_meta
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(product_start) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_comp'
Group by 1, product_start, price
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Accepted Bid Prices $simulation_comp

panels.description: Accepted Volume  per unit in chosen market

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  sum(accepted_volume) AS " ",
  unit_id AS "unit_id"
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_comp'
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, start_time
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Accepted Bid Volume $simulation_comp

panels.description: Bid prices of accepted bids per unit in the chosen market

targets.rawSql:
select sim1."time", sim2." " - sim1." " as "Volume", sim1.unit_id from (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  avg(price) AS " ",
  unit_id AS "unit_id"
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_base'
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, start_time
ORDER BY 1
) sim1
join (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  avg(price) AS " ",
  unit_id AS "unit_id"
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_comp'
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, start_time
ORDER BY 1) sim2
on sim1.time = sim2.time and sim1.unit_id = sim2.unit_id

panels.title: Accepted Bid Prices differences

panels.description: Accepted Volume  per unit in chosen market

targets.rawSql:
select sim1."time", sim2." " - sim1." " as "Volume", sim1.unit_id from (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  sum(accepted_volume) AS " ",
  unit_id AS "unit_id"
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_base'
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, start_time
ORDER BY 1
) sim1 
join (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  sum(accepted_volume) AS " ",
  unit_id AS "unit_id"
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_comp'
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, start_time
ORDER BY 1
) sim2 on sim1.time = sim2.time and sim1.unit_id = sim2.unit_id

panels.title: Accepted Bid Volume - differences

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  simulation,
  sum(round(CAST(value AS numeric), 2))  FILTER (WHERE variable = 'total_cost') as "Total cost",
  sum(round(CAST(value AS numeric), 2))  FILTER (WHERE variable = 'total_volume') as "Total volume"
FROM kpis
group by simulation
ORDER BY simulation

SELECT
  simulation,
  name,
  sum(round(CAST(value AS numeric), 2))  FILTER (WHERE variable = 'avg_price') as avg_price,
  sum(round(CAST(value AS numeric), 2))  FILTER (WHERE variable = 'total_cost') as total_cost,
  sum(round(CAST(value AS numeric), 2)*1000)  FILTER (WHERE variable = 'total_volume') as total_volume
  
FROM kpis
where variable in ('total_cost', 'total_volume', 'avg_price')
group by simulation, name
ORDER BY simulation

panels.description: Shows installed capacities in the simulation based on the fuel type

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  NOW() as time_sec,
  SUM(max_power),
  technology
FROM power_plant_meta
WHERE "simulation" LIKE '$simulation_comp'
GROUP BY technology, simulation;

panels.title: Installed Generation Capacities $simulation_comp

options.content:
# Unit Specific Data

For the chosen market and the chosen unit here the dispatch is displayed.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "Timestamp" AS "time",
  volume
FROM demand_meta
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("Timestamp")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  power AS "dispatch",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_comp' AND
  unit in ($Gen_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit, power
ORDER BY 1

options.content:
### General Information Name: {{index}}
Technology: {{technology}}
### Technical Specifications Emissions: {{emission_factor}} t/MWh
Maximum Power: {{max_power}} MW
Minimum Power: {{min_power}} MW
Efficiency: {{efficiency}}
##### Unit Operator: {{unit_operator}}
options.defaultContent: The query didn't return any results.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT * FROM power_plant_meta
WHERE index in ($Gen_Units) and simulation = '$simulation_comp'

select sim1."time", sim2."dispatch" - sim1."dispatch" as "dispatch", sim1.unit from (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  power AS "dispatch",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_base' AND
  unit in ($Gen_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit, power
ORDER BY 1
) sim1
left join (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  power AS "dispatch",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_comp' AND
  unit in ($Gen_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit, power
ORDER BY 1
) sim2
on sim1.unit = sim2.unit and sim1.time=sim2.time

SELECT
  concat(unit_id, '_', bid_type) AS "unit_id",
  sum(round(CAST(volume AS numeric), 2)) as "offered_volume",
  sum(round(CAST(accepted_volume AS numeric), 2)) as "accepted_volume"
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_comp' AND
  unit_id IN ($Gen_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, bid_type
ORDER BY 1

panels.description: Bid prices of accepted bids per unit in the chosen market

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  avg(price) AS "price",
  avg(volume) AS "volume",
  unit_id as "unit_id"
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  unit_id in ($Gen_Units) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_comp'
GROUP BY 1, unit_id
Order by 1

panels.title: Accepted Bid Prices

panels.description: Bid prices of accepted bids per unit in the chosen market

targets.rawSql:
select sim1."time", sim2."price" - sim1."price" as "price", sim2."volume" - sim1."volume" as "volume", sim1.unit_id from (
select
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  avg(price) AS "price",
  avg(volume) AS "volume",
  unit_id as "unit_id"
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  unit_id in ($Gen_Units) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_base'
GROUP BY 1, unit_id
ORDER BY 1
) sim1
left join (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  avg(price) AS "price",
  avg(volume) AS "volume",
  unit_id as "unit_id"
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  unit_id in ($Gen_Units) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_comp'
GROUP BY 1, unit_id
ORDER BY 1
) sim2
on sim1.time = sim2.time and sim1.unit_id = sim2.unit_id

panels.title: Accepted Bid Prices - Differences

options.content:
# Unit Specific Data

For the chosen market and the chosen unit here the dispatch is displayed.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "Timestamp" AS "time",
  volume
FROM demand_meta
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("Timestamp")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(datetime,$__interval),
  power AS "power",
  unit_id
FROM market_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_comp' AND
  unit_id in ($Demand_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, power
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  power AS "dispatch",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_comp' AND
  unit in ($Demand_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit, power
ORDER BY 1

options.content:
### General Information Name: {{index}}
Technology: {{technology}}
### Technical Specifications Emissions: {{emission_factor}} t/MWh
Maximum Power: {{max_power}} MW
Minimum Power: {{min_power}} MW
Efficiency: {{efficiency}}
##### Unit Operator: {{unit_operator}}
options.defaultContent: The query didn't return any results.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT * FROM demand_meta
WHERE index in ($Demand_Units) and simulation = '$simulation_comp'

select sim1."time", sim2."power" - sim1."power" as "power", sim1.unit_id from (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(datetime,$__interval),
  power AS "power",
  unit_id
FROM market_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_base' AND
  unit_id in ($Demand_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, power
ORDER BY 1
) sim1 left join
(SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(datetime,$__interval),
  power AS "power",
  unit_id
FROM market_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_comp' AND
  unit_id in ($Demand_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, power
ORDER BY 1) sim2
on sim1.unit_id = sim2.unit_id and sim1.time=sim2.time

select sim1."time", sim2."dispatch" - sim1."dispatch" as "dispatch", sim1.unit from (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  power AS "dispatch",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_base' AND
  unit in ($Demand_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit, power
ORDER BY 1
) sim1
left join (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  power AS "dispatch",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_comp' AND
  unit in ($Demand_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit, power
ORDER BY 1
) sim2
on sim1.unit = sim2.unit and sim1.time=sim2.time

options.content:
# Unit Specific Data

For the chosen market and the chosen storage unit here the dispatch is displayed.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "Timestamp" AS "time",
  volume
FROM demand_meta
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("Timestamp")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(datetime,$__interval),
  power AS "power",
  unit_id
FROM market_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_comp' AND
  unit_id in ($Storage_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, power
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  power AS "dispatch",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_comp' AND
  unit in ($Storage_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit, power
ORDER BY 1

options.content:
### General Information Name: {{index}}
Technology: {{technology}}
### Technical Specifications Emissions: {{emission_factor}} t/MWh
Maximum Power Disharge: {{max_power_discharge}} MW
Minimum Power Discharge: {{min_power_discharge}} MW
Efficiency Discharge: {{efficiency_discharge}}
Maximum Power Charge: {{max_power_charge}} MW
Minimum Power Charge: {{min_power_charge}} MW
Efficiency Charge: {{efficiency_charge}}
##### Unit Operator: {{unit_operator}}
options.defaultContent: The query didn't return any results.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT * FROM storage_meta
WHERE index in ($Storage_Units) and simulation = '$simulation_comp'

select sim1."time", sim2."power" - sim1."power" as "power", sim1.unit_id from (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(datetime,$__interval),
  power AS "power",
  unit_id
FROM market_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_base' AND
  unit_id in ($Storage_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, power
ORDER BY 1
) sim1 join
(SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(datetime,$__interval),
  power AS "power",
  unit_id
FROM market_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_comp' AND
  unit_id in ($Storage_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, power
ORDER BY 1) sim2
on sim1.unit_id = sim2.unit_id and sim1.time=sim2.time

select sim1."time", sim2."dispatch" - sim1."dispatch" as "dispatch", sim1.unit from (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  power AS "dispatch",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_base' AND
  unit in ($Storage_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit, power
ORDER BY 1
) sim1
join (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  power AS "dispatch",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  simulation = '$simulation_comp' AND
  unit in ($Storage_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit, power
ORDER BY 1
) sim2
on sim1.unit = sim2.unit and sim1.time=sim2.time

list.definition:
SELECT 
  simulation
FROM power_plant_meta
group by simulation;

  simulation
FROM power_plant_meta
group by simulation;

  simulation
FROM power_plant_meta
group by simulation;
